casebody.data:
Bonnie CRUICKSHANK-WALLACE and William Wallace, Petitioners
v.
CNA FINANCIAL CORPORATION and Continental Casualty Company and Columbia Casualty Company and James S. Tupitza, Esquire and Tupitza & Associates, P.C., Respondents Bonnie Cruickshank-Wallace and William Wallace, Petitioner
v.
Gerard P. Egan, Esquire and Egan Young Law Firm and Neil E. Jokelson, Esquire and Neil E. Jokelson & Associates, Respondents No. 852 MAL 2017
No. 853 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 19, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application for Leave to Amend/Supplement PAA are DENIED.
